Articles.Content:
Hello!

At this point I'm not sure this is really a cosmetic bug, but I'd gladly accept this as a suggestion..

A training scenario can define a custom image, title and even a link when the scenario is listed, however all of them are listed using the same icon.

It is interesting that other game areas already consider the type of scenario when creating the listings:

I don't have a clear idea on what to suggest, but any of the following ideas would be great:

- change the icon to match the "Mode" defition from the sfs file: 0 SANDBOX, 1 CAREER, 2 SCENARIO, 3 NON RESUMABLE SCENARIO

- Include a parameter in the sfs to specify the icon for this game (defaulting to -Mode icon- if the parameter is not set).

now.. Fight!!
